author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
For over a decade now Valve has been invested into Linux gaming and many people seem to have forgotten why that was the case, so lets go back a little in time to talk about Valve and Linux gaming, before the SteamDeck, before Proton, before even the Steam Machines
